Sjasm Z80 Assembler 0.42c
=========================
Unofficial fork of sjasm. Some compilations bugs fixed.

Have fun.

Installation
============
```
cmake .
make
sudo make install
```

Webs
====
- Home page [http://home.wanadoo.nl/smastijn/sjasm.html]
- Github [https://github.com/samsaga2/sjasm]
